data.lyric:
[ti:Slow Dance In A Parking Lot (Acoustic)]
[ar:Jordan Davis]
[al:Slow Dance In A Parking Lot(Acoustic)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Slow Dance In A Parking Lot (Acoustic) - Jordan Davis
[00:04.07]Lyrics by：Jordan Davis/Lonnie Lee Fowler
[00:08.14]Composed by：Jordan Davis/Lonnie Lee Fowler
[00:12.21]Lights go down wheels go around
[00:14.93]I'm taking you home
[00:16.35]Hoping for a slow song to come on the radio now
[00:21.10]I'm not ready to shut it down
[00:23.32]The way the dashboard glow
[00:25.45]Is hitting your eyes making me lose everything on my mind
[00:29.87]And the only thing I wanna do is find a spot
[00:32.93]Stop this car and throw it in park and get just
[00:36.35]Slow dance with you
[00:42.46]Spinning you around by the Walmart sign
[00:45.02]And moving our feet over the painted white lines
[00:48.08]Getting close to you
[00:54.43]Making the most of whatever we got
[00:56.76]Even if it's just a slow dance in a parking lot
[01:06.04]Half song gone one door open across the lot
[01:10.28]A rent a cop's rolling a security car
[01:13.45]And it's yellow lights spinning and flashing in time
[01:16.51]To the radio singing
[01:17.90]A little Garth Brooks
[01:19.54]You start humming the very last verse to she's every woman
[01:23.89]And I don't care what song comes next
[01:26.86]I'm falling right here don't wanna safety net in a
[01:30.13]Slow dance with you
[01:36.50]Spinning you around by the Walmart sign
[01:38.96]And moving our feet over the painted white lines
[01:41.96]Getting close to you
[01:48.53]Making the most of whatever we got
[01:50.82]Even if it's just a slow dance in a parking lot
[01:59.88]In a parking lot
[02:05.89]And get close to you
[02:12.50]Making the most of whatever we got even if it's just
[02:17.76]A slow dance with you
[02:24.50]Spinning you around by the Walmart sign
[02:27.04]And moving our feet over the painted white lines
[02:29.90]Getting close to you
[02:36.40]Making the most of whatever we got
[02:38.81]Even if it's just a slow dance in a parking lot
[02:47.87]In a parking lot

[00:12.21]灯光熄灭车轮转动
[00:14.93]我带你回家
[00:16.35]希望收音机里播放一首舒缓的歌
[00:21.10]我还没准备好结束这一切
[00:23.32]仪表盘发出耀眼的光芒
[00:25.45]与你耳鬓厮磨让我失去理智
[00:29.87]我唯一想做的事就是找到一个位置
[00:32.93]停下车把车停在公园里
[00:36.35]与你翩翩起舞
[00:42.46]在沃尔玛的招牌前让你晕头转向
[00:45.02]迈动双脚越过画好的白线
[00:48.08]渐渐靠近你
[00:54.43]竭尽所能
[00:56.76]即使只是在停车场里跳一支慢舞
[01:06.04]半首歌没了一扇门打开了
[01:10.28]房租警察开着保安车
[01:13.45]黄色的灯光闪烁不停地闪烁
[01:16.51]对着收音机歌唱
[01:17.90]有点像加斯·布鲁克斯
[01:19.54]你开始哼唱最后一段歌词她是每个女人
[01:23.89]我不在乎下一首是什么歌
[01:26.86]我就在这里坠落我不想让自己身陷囹圄
[01:30.13]与你翩翩起舞
[01:36.50]在沃尔玛的招牌前让你晕头转向
[01:38.96]迈动双脚越过画好的白线
[01:41.96]渐渐靠近你

[01:50.82]即使只是在停车场里跳一支慢舞
[01:59.88]在停车场
